subject: Coaches and Managers
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Bo Kimble, once the leading scorer in the nation, hopes to be a head coach someday. For now, he is an assistant working with a community college team that is experimenting with fast-break basketball.
snippet: Bo Kimble, once the leading scorer in the nation, hopes to be a head coach someday. For now, he is an assistant working with a community college team that is experimenting with fast-break basketball.
